question: Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is closer to the camera?
question_with_options:
Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is closer to the camera?
A. lighted lamp
B. sofa
C. None
D. None
triage_reason: The lighted lamp is on a bedside table next to the bed, which is in the foreground, while the sofa is further back in the room, making the lamp clearly closer to the camera.
